016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources;
017
018import jakarta.inject.Inject;
019import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
020import jakarta.ws.rs.OPTIONS;
021import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
022import jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext;
023import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Context;
024import jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response;
025import jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriInfo;
027import org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request;
028import org.eclipse.jetty.server.UserIdentity;
029import org.glassfish.hk2.api.ServiceLocator;
030
031import javax.security.auth.Subject;
032import java.util.Optional;
033
034import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.MediaTypes.PRODUCES_JSON_API_TEXT_HTML_YAML;
035
036@Produces(PRODUCES_JSON_API_TEXT_HTML_YAML)
037public abstract class JsonApiResource
038        implements ResourceContext {
039    @Inject
040    private ServiceLocator serviceLocator;
041
042    @Context
043    private ContainerRequestContext containerRequestContext;
044
045    @Context
046    private HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest;
047
048    public ServiceLocator getServiceLocator() {
049        return serviceLocator;
050    }
051
052    public SecurityContext getSecurityContext() {
053        return containerRequestContext.getSecurityContext();
054    }
055
056    public UriInfo getUriInfo() {
057        return containerRequestContext.getUriInfo();
058    }
059
060    public ContainerRequestContext getContainerRequestContext() {
061        return containerRequestContext;
062    }
063
064    public HttpServletRequest getHttpServletRequest()
065    {
066        return httpServletRequest;
067    }
068
069    @OPTIONS
070    public Response options() {
071        return Response.ok()
072                .header("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "*")
073                .header("Access-Control-Allow-Methods", "POST, GET, PATCH, OPTIONS")
074                .header("Access-Control-Allow-Headers", "content-type, accept, cookie, authorization")
075                .build();
076    }
077}
